name: Please Be Careful...
description:
You are a giant pair of legs. Try not to destroy the town. Or maybe do try to destroy the town. I won't judge. Control the legs by clicking on a boot and flinging the mouse.

Made with Unity3D(2D?), Inkscape, Audacity, and a lot of screaming and crying in the recording booth at 2 o'clock in the morning.

Future goals:
-iOS/Android
-More shoes
-More buildings
